name: Slide ►
description:
Thanks to our more than 4.5 MILLION players for making Slide a global sensation!

You do it all the time, but have you mastered it? A simple yet addictive game which tests your speed and unlocking prowess.

- Four distinctive game modes
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Slick graphics and original soundtrack
- Earn Keys and unlock Upgrades to take your game to the next level!
- Over 30 achievements & 750 Game Center points to unlock!

Music by Jackson Hyland-Lipski
